title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
text: Urologist says this may be used prevent new stones from forming but doesn’t do anything for existing stones. I’m willing to try to prevent further stones from forming. No taste and easy to swallow.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
text: This is great for anyone that has oxalate kidney stones. This brand is of excellent quality and high absorption

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2018
text: I use for preventing my kidney stones. After my last stone bout, my doc prescribed some ridiculously expensive and painfully huge horse pills; these were a welcome substitute. So far, no stones... knocking on wood. Thorne is one of my fave vitamin providers.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2015
text: Prone to kidney stones, hoping this will do as it says it supposed to do---prevent them.  Hope it works.  So far, so good.  Time will tell.

title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2014
text: Husband has to take potassium citrate to help prevent kidney stones.  Decided to try these instead of the $500 prescription just take 2 or 3 of these compared to one of the prescription.  So far so good and it's been almost a year.
